verses.verse: וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> Now there was a certain מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָרָמָתַ֛יִם צוֹפִ֖ים <S%H7436><s%> of Ramathaimzophim מֵהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> of mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וּשְׁמ֡וֹ <S%H8034><s%> and his name אֶ֠לְקָנָה <S%H511><s%> [was] Elkanah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְרֹחָ֧ם <S%H3395><s%> of Jeroham בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֱלִיה֛וּא <S%H453><s%> of Elihu בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son תֹּ֥חוּ <S%H8459><s%> of Tohu בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צ֖וּף <S%H6689><s%> of Zuph אֶפְרָתִֽי׃ <S%H673><s%> an Ephrathite

וְלוֹ֙ שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> And he had two נָשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> wives שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> the name אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> of the one חַנָּ֔ה <S%H2584><s%> [was] Hannah וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> of the other פְּנִנָּ֑ה <S%H6444><s%> Peninnah וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> had לִפְנִנָּה֙ <S%H6444><s%> and Peninnah יְלָדִ֔ים <S%H3206><s%> had children וּלְחַנָּ֖ה <S%H2584><s%> but Hannah אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> had יְלָדִֽים׃ <S%H3206><s%> had no children

וְעָלָה֩ <S%H5927><s%> went up הָאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man הַה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> And this מֵֽעִירוֹ֙ <S%H5892><s%> out of his city מִיָּמִ֣ים ׀ <S%H3117><s%> yearly יָמִ֔ימָה <S%H3117><s%> yearly לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֧ת <S%H7812><s%> to worship וְלִזְבֹּ֛חַ <S%H2076><s%> and to sacrifice לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts בְּשִׁלֹ֑ה <S%H7887><s%> in Shiloh וְשָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> there שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> And the two בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons עֵלִ֗י <S%H5941><s%> of Eli חָפְנִי֙ <S%H2652><s%> Hophni וּפִ֣נְחָ֔ס <S%H6372><s%> and Phinehas כֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And when the time וַיִּזְבַּ֖ח <S%H2076><s%> offered אֶלְקָנָ֑ה <S%H511><s%> was that Elkanah וְנָתַ֞ן <S%H5414><s%> he gave לִפְנִנָּ֣ה <S%H6444><s%> to Peninnah אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife וּֽלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּנֶ֛יהָ <S%H1121><s%> and to all her sons וּבְנוֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H1323><s%> and her daughters מָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H4490><s%> portions

וּלְחַנָּ֕ה <S%H2584><s%> But unto Hannah יִתֵּ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> he gave מָנָ֥ה <S%H4490><s%> portion אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> a אַפָּ֑יִם <S%H639><s%> worthy כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַנָּה֙ <S%H2584><s%> Hannah אָהֵ֔ב <S%H157><s%> for he loved וַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD סָגַ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> had shut up רַחְמָֽהּ׃ <S%H7358><s%> her womb

וְכִֽעֲסַ֤תָּה <S%H3707><s%> also provoked צָֽרָתָהּ֙ <S%H6869><s%> And her adversary גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again כַּ֔עַס <S%H3708><s%> her sore בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> because of הַרְּעִמָ֑הּ <S%H7481><s%> for to make her fret כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> her because סָגַ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> had shut יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD בְּעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> up רַחְמָֽהּ׃ <S%H7358><s%> her womb

וְכֵ֨ן <S%H3651><s%> It יַעֲשֶׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> And [as] he did שָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> so year בְשָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> by year מִדֵּ֤י <S%H1767><s%> when עֲלֹתָהּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> she went up בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that תַּכְעִסֶ֑נָּה <S%H3707><s%> so she provoked וַתִּבְכֶּ֖ה <S%H1058><s%> her therefore she wept וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תֹאכַֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> and did not eat

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said לָ֜הּ אֶלְקָנָ֣ה <S%H511><s%> Elkanah אִישָׁ֗הּ <S%H376><s%> her husband חַנָּה֙ <S%H2584><s%> to her Hannah לָ֣מֶה <S%H4100><s%> why תִבְכִּ֗י <S%H1058><s%> why weepest וְלָ֙מֶה֙ <S%H4100><s%> and why לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תֹֽאכְלִ֔י <S%H398><s%> thou? and why eatest וְלָ֖מֶה <S%H4100><s%> and why יֵרַ֣ע <S%H3415><s%> grieved לְבָבֵ֑ךְ <S%H3824><s%> thou not? and why is thy heart הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> ? [am] not I better לָ֔ךְ מֵעֲשָׂרָ֖ה <S%H6235><s%> to thee than ten בָּנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted

וַתָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up חַנָּ֔ה <S%H2584><s%> So Hannah אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> after אָכְלָ֥ה <S%H398><s%> they had eaten בְשִׁלֹ֖ה <S%H7887><s%> in Shiloh וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> and after שָׁתֹ֑ה <S%H8354><s%> they had drunk וְעֵלִ֣י <S%H5941><s%> Now Eli הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest יֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַכִּסֵּ֔א <S%H3678><s%> upon a seat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by מְזוּזַ֖ת <S%H4201><s%> by a post הֵיכַ֥ל <S%H1964><s%> of the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> She מָ֣רַת <S%H4751><s%> And she [was] in bitterness נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> of soul וַתִּתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <S%H6419><s%> and prayed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וּבָכֹ֥ה <S%H1058><s%> and wept תִבְכֶּֽה׃ <S%H1058><s%> sore

וַתִּדֹּ֨ר <S%H5087><s%> And she vowed נֶ֜דֶר <S%H5088><s%> a vow וַתֹּאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> and said יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if רָאֹ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> if thou wilt indeed תִרְאֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H7200><s%> look בָּעֳנִ֣י <S%H6040><s%> on the affliction אֲמָתֶ֗ךָ <S%H519><s%> of thine handmaid וּזְכַרְתַּ֙נִי֙ <S%H2142><s%> and remember וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall never תִשְׁכַּ֣ח <S%H7911><s%> me and not forget אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H519><s%> thine handmaid וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> but wilt give לַאֲמָתְךָ֖ <S%H519><s%> unto thine handmaid זֶ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> child אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H376><s%> then וּנְתַתִּ֤יו <S%H5414><s%> then I will give לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> him unto the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיָּ֔יו <S%H2416><s%> of his life וּמוֹרָ֖ה <S%H4177><s%> and there shall no razor לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall never יַעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> upon his head

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> came כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הִרְבְּתָ֔ה <S%H7235><s%> And it came to pass as she continued לְהִתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <S%H6419><s%> praying לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְעֵלִ֖י <S%H5941><s%> that Eli שֹׁמֵ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> marked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּֽיהָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> her mouth

וְחַנָּ֗ה <S%H2584><s%> Now Hannah הִ֚יא <S%H1931><s%> she מְדַבֶּ֣רֶת <S%H1696><s%> she spake עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in לִבָּ֔הּ <S%H3820><s%> in her heart רַ֚ק <S%H7535><s%> but שְׂפָתֶ֣יהָ <S%H8193><s%> only her lips נָּע֔וֹת <S%H5128><s%> moved וְקוֹלָ֖הּ <S%H6963><s%> but her voice לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> was not יִשָּׁמֵ֑עַ <S%H8085><s%> was not heard וַיַּחְשְׁבֶ֥הָ <S%H2803><s%> thought עֵלִ֖י <S%H5941><s%> therefore Eli לְשִׁכֹּרָֽה׃ <S%H7910><s%> she had been drunken

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> then עֵלִ֔י <S%H5941><s%> And Eli עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֖י <S%H4970><s%> to her How תִּשְׁתַּכָּרִ֑ין <S%H7937><s%> unto her How long wilt thou be drunken הָסִ֥ירִי <S%H5493><s%> ? put away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֵינֵ֖ךְ <S%H3196><s%> thy wine מֵעָלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַתַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered חַנָּ֤ה <S%H2584><s%> And Hannah וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> neither אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> No my lord אִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> I [am] a woman קְשַׁת־ <S%H7186><s%> of a sorrowful ר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> spirit אָנֹ֔כִי <S%H595><s%> I וְיַ֥יִן <S%H3196><s%> neither wine וְשֵׁכָ֖ר <S%H7941><s%> nor strong drink לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁתִ֑יתִי <S%H8354><s%> I have drunk וָאֶשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ <S%H8210><s%> but have poured out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> my soul לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> Count אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲמָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H519><s%> not thine handmaid לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> for בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> a daughter בְּלִיָּ֑עַל <S%H1100><s%> of Belial כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> out מֵרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> for out of the abundance שִׂיחִ֛י <S%H7879><s%> of my complaint וְכַעְסִ֖י <S%H3708><s%> and grief דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> have I spoken עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> now

וַיַּ֧עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered עֵלִ֛י <S%H5941><s%> Then Eli וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לְכִ֣י <S%H1980><s%> Go לְשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace וֵאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> and the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יִתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> grant אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣לָתֵ֔ךְ <S%H7596><s%> [thee] thy petition אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you שָׁאַ֖לְתְּ <S%H7592><s%> that thou hast asked מֵעִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said תִּמְצָ֧א <S%H4672><s%> find שִׁפְחָתְךָ֛ <S%H8198><s%> Let thine handmaid חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight וַתֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went הָאִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> So the woman לְדַרְכָּהּ֙ <S%H1870><s%> her way וַתֹּאכַ֔ל <S%H398><s%> and did eat וּפָנֶ֥יהָ <S%H6440><s%> and her countenance לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> was no הָיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become לָ֖הּ עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> longer

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣מוּ <S%H7925><s%> early בַבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲווּ֙ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיָּשֻׁ֛בוּ <S%H7725><s%> and returned וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּיתָ֖ם <S%H1004><s%> to their house הָרָמָ֑תָה <S%H7414><s%> to Ramah וַיֵּ֤דַע <S%H3045><s%> knew אֶלְקָנָה֙ <S%H511><s%> and Elkanah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַנָּ֣ה <S%H2584><s%> Hannah אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife וַיִּֽזְכְּרֶ֖הָ <S%H2142><s%> remembered יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came לִתְקֻפ֣וֹת <S%H8622><s%> was come הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> Wherefore it came to pass when the time וַתַּ֥הַר <S%H2029><s%> had conceived חַנָּ֖ה <S%H2584><s%> about after Hannah וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> that she bare בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַתִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> his name שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because מֵיְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> him of the LORD שְׁאִלְתִּֽיו׃ <S%H7592><s%> [saying] Because I have asked

וַיַּ֛עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up הָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man אֶלְקָנָ֖ה <S%H511><s%> Elkanah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and all his house לִזְבֹּ֧חַ <S%H2076><s%> to offer לַֽיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶ֥בַח <S%H2077><s%> sacrifice הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> the yearly וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִדְרֽוֹ׃ <S%H5088><s%> and his vow

וְחַנָּ֖ה <S%H2584><s%> But Hannah לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not עָלָ֑תָה <S%H5927><s%> went not up כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> for she said לְאִישָׁ֗הּ <S%H376><s%> unto her husband עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> for יִגָּמֵ֤ל <S%H1580><s%> be weaned הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <S%H5288><s%> [I will not go up] until the child וַהֲבִאֹתִ֗יו <S%H935><s%> and [then] I will bring וְנִרְאָה֙ <S%H7200><s%> him that he may appear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְיָ֥שַׁב <S%H3427><s%> and there abide שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהּ֩ אֶלְקָנָ֨ה <S%H511><s%> And Elkanah אִישָׁ֜הּ <S%H376><s%> her husband עֲשִׂ֧י <S%H6213><s%> unto her Do הַטּ֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> thee good בְּעֵינַ֗יִךְ <S%H5869><s%> what seemeth שְׁבִי֙ <S%H3427><s%> tarry עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until גָּמְלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1580><s%> until thou have weaned אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> אַ֛ךְ <S%H389><s%> only יָקֵ֥ם <S%H6965><s%> establish יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> him only the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָר֑וֹ <S%H1697><s%> his word וַתֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> abode הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> So the woman וַתֵּ֣ינֶק <S%H3243><s%> suck אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנָ֔הּ <S%H1121><s%> and gave her son עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until גָמְלָ֖הּ <S%H1580><s%> until she weaned אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַתַּעֲלֵ֨הוּ <S%H5927><s%> him she took him up עִמָּ֜הּ <S%H5973><s%> with כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after גְּמָלַ֗תּוּ <S%H1580><s%> And when she had weaned בְּפָרִ֤ים <S%H6499><s%> bullocks שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> with her with three וְאֵיפָ֨ה <S%H374><s%> ephah אַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> and one קֶ֙מַח֙ <S%H7058><s%> of flour וְנֵ֣בֶל <S%H5035><s%> and a bottle יַ֔יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine וַתְּבִאֵ֥הוּ <S%H935><s%> and brought בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> him unto the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שִׁל֑וֹ <S%H7887><s%> in Shiloh וְהַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> and the child נָֽעַר׃ <S%H5288><s%> [was] young

וַֽיִּשְׁחֲט֖וּ <S%H7819><s%> And they slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֑ר <S%H6499><s%> a bullock וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> the child אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵלִֽי׃ <S%H5941><s%> to Eli

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And she said בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> Oh אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> my lord חֵ֥י <S%H2416><s%> liveth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> [as] thy soul אֲדֹנִ֑י <S%H113><s%> my lord אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am הָאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> I [am] the woman הַנִּצֶּ֤בֶת <S%H5324><s%> that stood עִמְּכָה֙ <S%H5973><s%> beside בָּזֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> here לְהִתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <S%H6419><s%> by thee here praying אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַנַּ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> For this child הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this הִתְפַּלָּ֑לְתִּי <S%H6419><s%> I prayed וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לִי֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁאֵ֣לָתִ֔י <S%H7596><s%> me my petition אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁאַ֖לְתִּי <S%H7592><s%> which I asked מֵעִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> have also אָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I הִשְׁאִלְתִּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7592><s%> Therefore also I have lent לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> him to the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> he הַיָּמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> as long as he liveth אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he הָיָ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> lives ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7592><s%> he shall be lent לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ <S%H7812><s%> And he worshipped שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פ
